subtitle: A satisfying flan served warm or cold for a picnic.

method.text: Roll out pastry on a lightly floured surface. Use to line a 20 cm round fluted flan tin. Trim off any excess. Prick the base with a fork. Chill for 30 min.
Transfer to the oven and bake blind for 15 min.
Remove the greaseproof paper and beans and cook for a further 5 min or until crisp. Reduce oven temperature to 190°C.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the salad onion, courgette slices and garlic. Gently cook for 3-5 min or until softened. Leave to cool slightly.
Scatter over the pastry flan case: the cooked salad onion, courgettes and garlic, bacon strips, smoked pork sausage slices and tomato slices.
In a jug, beat together the eggs, cream, chives and seasoning. Pour over flan filling.
Place on a baking tray and cook in the oven for 30-35 min or until set and golden. Serve hot or cold in slices.
